7
PERIODICALS
AV Communication Review. Published bimonthly by the Department
of Audiovisual Instruction, NEA, 1201 Sixteenth Street, N.W.,
Washington, D.C. 20036 $6 per annum.
CETO News. Center for Educational Television Overseas, the Studio,
Nuffield Lodge, Regents's Park, London, N.W. 1
Etudes de Radio-Television. Published quarterly by Bureau d'Etudes
de la Radio-Television Beige, Place Flagey, Bruxelles, Belgique.
European Broadcasting Union Review. Editorial and Publishing
Office, 1, rue de Varembe, Geneva, Switzerland. (Special issues on
educational broadcasting in European countries and other continents.)
Journal of Broadcasting. Published quarterly by the Association for
Professional Broadcasting Education, University of Southern California,
University Park, Los Angeles 7, California. $6 per annum.
NAEB Journalo Published bimonthly by the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters, 119 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois. $6
per annum.
Television Quarterly. Published quarterly by the National Academy
of Television Arts and Sciences with the cooperation of the Television
and Radio Center of Syracuse University, Syracuse 10, New York.
$5 per annum.
Television and Adult Education. Published quarterly at 27, Rue
Cassett, Paris 6e, France. $3 per annum.
